title: [GOERLI] No sync geth or prysm?
body:
#### System information

Geth version: `1.10.23`
S.O: Ubuntu 20.04

Problem:

It's been working until 2-3 days ago fine but now it's not working and I don't know if it's geth or prysm.

But the problem is that neither geth nor prysm advances

Sorry my bad english.

GETH Log
```
ago 30 10:11:39 cyberpanel geth[1240073]: WARN [08-30|10:11:39.198] Ignoring already known beacon payload    number=7,485,490 hash=6528b5..4a8f22 age=2d55m3s
ago 30 10:11:39 cyberpanel geth[1240073]: WARN [08-30|10:11:39.212] Ignoring already known beacon payload    number=7,485,491 hash=66f047..f3862e age=2d54m51s
ago 30 10:11:51 cyberpanel geth[1240073]: WARN [08-30|10:11:51.701] Snapshot extension registration failed   peer=2b236036 err="peer connected on snap without compatible eth support"
ago 30 10:11:55 cyberpanel geth[1240073]: WARN [08-30|10:11:55.912] Ignoring already known beacon payload    number=7,485,490 hash=6528b5..4a8f22 age=2d55m19s
ago 30 10:11:55 cyberpanel geth[1240073]: WARN [08-30|10:11:55.926] Ignoring already known beacon payload    number=7,485,491 hash=66f047..f3862e age=2d55m7s

ago 30 10:12:19 cyberpanel geth[1240073]: WARN [08-30|10:12:19.064] Ignoring already known beacon payload    number=7,485,490 hash=6528b5..4a8f22 age=2d55m43s
ago 30 10:12:19 cyberpanel geth[1240073]: WARN [08-30|10:12:19.078] Ignoring already known beacon payload    number=7,485,491 hash=66f047..f3862e age=2d55m31s
ago 30 10:12:19 cyberpanel geth[1240073]: WARN [08-30|10:12:19.496] Snapshot extension registration failed   peer=e0963484 err="peer connected on snap without compatible eth support"
```
PRYSM Log

```
ago 30 10:14:18 cyberpanel prysm.sh[1009563]: time="2022-08-30 10:14:18" level=info msg="Processing block batch of size 34 starting from  0xbf849752... 3763712/3778271 - estimated time remaining 36m12s" blocksPerSecond=6.7 peers=104 prefix=initial-sync
```

Looks like prysm is still syncing and feeding us old blocks from 2 days ago. Judging from the logs, prysm should be synced soon though: `estimated time remaining 12m8s`

> Looks like prysm is still syncing and feeding us old blocks from 2 days ago. Judging from the logs, prysm should be synced soon though: `estimated time remaining 12m8s`

That's what I thought but prysm never advances, it has stayed in a loop, it always shows the same records

```
ago 30 10:37:34 cyberpanel prysm.sh[1009563]: time="2022-08-30 10:37:34" level=warning msg="Batch is not processed" error="could not process block in batch: could not retrieve block roots: invalid end slot and start slot provided" prefix=initial-sync

```
New log

You'll need to take this up at the Prysm side. We can only advance if the beacon client advances and tells us where to go .If the beacon client is stuck, we'll just wait for it to give us some new data. Also seems to be some issue being reported by Prysm.

```
Batch is not processed" error="beacon node doesn't have a parent in db with root: 0x116bd1c3fe26970797b9a0f67011b7a0150a99923af9acb11ce19ae0bb08aa77
```

> You'll need to take this up at the Prysm side. We can only advance if the beacon client advances and tells us where to go .If the beacon client is stuck, we'll just wait for it to give us some new data. Also seems to be some issue being reported by Prysm.

If I thought it was a problem with prysm but I wasn't sure if I needed geth to move forward, I'll close the thread and wait for a response from prysm. Thank you for solving my doubt
